Name: Product Strategy & Roadmapping

Name: Customer Discovery & Development
Description: I have experience crafting user and buyer personas using quantitative and qualitative insights I have gathered from performing data analysis and conducting interviews. When performing data analysis, I aim to quantitatively and broadly understand who the various segments of customers or users are and how they use the product. Typically, this involves writing SQL queries in Redshift or Mode Analytics and manipulating analytics tools such as Amplitude, Mixpanel, Google Analytics, etc. When conducting interviews, I aim to qualitatively and specifically understand who each of the various segments of customers or users are, what they are trying to accomplish, how they are managing to accomplish their goals, how they feel and why. Typically this involves various types of interviews depending on what my objective is at the given time such as customer discovery interviews, customer development interviews, user product feedback interviews, etc. Additionally, I look to gather insights from in-app feedback retrieval mechanisms (surveys, reviews, feedback widgets, etc.). When appropriate, I gather insights from customer success, support, sales, and marketing teams.

Name: Prioritization and Problem Solving
Description: Expert in Webflow, a powerful platform that offers the flexibility and scalability your website needs. Our developers leverage Webflow's capabilities to build custom, high-performing websites that not only look exceptional but also function seamlessly across devices. From e-commerce stores to interactive portfolios, we have the expertise to bring your vision to life.

Name: Product Execution & Delivery
Description: Web design services are more than just aesthetics; they're about creating engaging, user-friendly, and visually captivating websites. Whether you're looking to refresh your existing site or start from scratch, our talented designers will collaborate closely with you to craft a website that embodies your brand's personality, meets your goals, and leaves a lasting impression.

Name: Product Launches & Marketing
Description: Involves bringing new products to market and driving their adoption. Great product launches require a deep understanding of the market, customer needs, and the competitive landscape to position the product effectively. This skill set includes activities such as composing personas, crafting compelling messaging and value propositions, developing and implementing marketing campaigns across various channels, and conducting data analysis to track campaign performance and iterate as needed.

Name: Product Design
Description: Product Design involves identifying user needs and conceptualizing solutions using design software such as Figma, Adobe XD, or Affinity Design. Typically, the best solutions accomplish the product team's goals while providing a high degree of functionality, usability, and aesthetics. Graphic design involves using design software such as Figma, Adobe XD/Photoshop, or Affinity Design/Photo to create visual communication, using elements like typography, imagery, and color to convey messages and achieve results such as product adoption and engagement or customer conversion.

Name: Data Analysis & SQL
Description: Data analysis involves inspecting, cleaning, transforming, and modeling data using SQL or no-code data analysis tools like Mixpanel or Amplitude, with the goal of discovering insights related to product usage, user behavior, and customer segments so that key decisions can be made faster and more accurately.
